17/8/2019 5:15 p.Â m. - AndrÃ©s Morales (Costa Rica): The whole number in the footage nomenclature of a Mutation stop indicates in which octave the added harmonic note will sound. For example, the 2 2/3' will sound in the octave between the 4' and 2' pitches, or one octave and a fifth above the note being played.  The 1 3/5' stop will sound between the 2' and 1' pitch, or two octaves and a third above the note being played.
